name: Don Tomas - Corojo - No. 554
additionalNotes: Don Tomas Corojo is the strongest offering available from Don Tomas. Handmade in Honduras, these cigars feature oily, reddish-hued Corojo wrappers along with a beefy blend of Honduran, Nicaraguan and Mexican tobaccos. Medium to full-bodied, these cigars offer notes of earth, cedar and leather with a generous helping of spice.
